author: PoeHub Team
name: PoeHub
description: A Red-DiscordBot Cog that connects to multiple LLM APIs: Poe, OpenAI, Anthropic (Claude), Google (Gemini), DeepSeek, and OpenRouter. Features multi-model switching, encrypted conversation history, and more.
install_msg: Thank you for installing PoeHub! Use [p]load poehub to load the cog. Set your provider with [p]setprovider and API key with [p]setapikey. For help, use [p]help PoeHub.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user preferences (model selection, private mode) and optionally conversation history. All data is encrypted using Fernet encryption. Users can purge their data anytime with [p]purge_my_data.
